channel.title: RuneScape Recent News
channel.description: The latest news for RuneScape, the massively-multiplayer online game developed and published by Jagex.

item.title: Love Story
item.description: A shadow is emerging from the Wise Old Man’s murky past. New Construction and Magic abilities could be yours if you can handle combat, puzzles, sarcasm, a love-sick old man and a damsel in distress who just won’t stop crying.

item.title: Lookey-Likey Costume Competition Winners
item.description: The weekend is over and so ends the July 2010 Lookey-Likey Costume Competition! After much deliberation we’ve decided on our winners...

item.title: Price Promotion: PayBySMS with Paymo in Australia
item.description: We are excited to announce the ability to pay for your RuneScape membership via Paymo in Australia - with a fantastic 9% discount on SMS!

item.title: Players' Gallery
item.description: Yes, it was just one month ago that we brought the Players' Gallery back in full force, and we’ve been overwhelmed by the sheer volume and positivity of your response. So, as promised, we’re back this month with another selection of RuneScape-inspired masterpieces for you to enjoy.

item.title: RuneScape Summer Festival
item.description: This weekend there’s a big holiday over in the USA in the form of the Fourth of July (Independence Day). To Community Management, that sounds like a good a reason as any for a weekend of community events! Read on for a competition, parade, PvP challenge and more.

item.title: Behind the Scenes – July
item.description: Love stories, expansive Dungeoneering rewards, class rings and elite treasure trail rewards await in this month’s updates! Sound good?

item.title: Big Ticket Prize Draw – June (Winner!)
item.description: June’s Big Ticket prize draw has been held; next month, it’s time for the final Big Ticket prize draw...

item.title: Guaranteed Content Poll: Halloween 2010 Result
item.description: Two weeks ago, we released a Guaranteed Content Poll regarding this year’s Halloween reward. The poll has now been closed, the results have been counted and we can now reveal that the winning option is...

item.title: Big Ticket Prize Draw – June (Reminder)
item.description: The next Big Ticket prize draw is just around the corner – be sure to enter if you’d like to win an all-expenses-paid trip to the UK!

item.title: Miner Disturbance for iPhone, iPod and iPad
item.description: We've just updated one of our old classics, Miner Disturbance, for the Apple iPhone - and it's the #5 overall paid app in the UK!

item.title: Quiet Before the Swarm
item.description: Could one of the creatures from Pest Control have slipped past the Void Knights’ onto the mainland? Put your investigative, puzzle-solving and pest controlling skills to the test to find out the truth in this low-level quest, the first in a new quest series. Check the news for a video!

item.title: Free-to-play Quest Changes
item.description: The Swept Away and Myths of the White Lands quests have been made permanently free-to-play! Any free-players who missed out on the opportunity to play these low-level, yet fun and puzzling, quests before can now do so at their leisure.

item.title: RuneScape Cards Now More Widely Available in the US
item.description: RuneScape Cards are now available from your nearest 7Eleven, Casey’s and Speedway stores throughout the US, which gives more choice to our players and access to more places from which to buy RuneScape credit. We are continuing to expand where these cards are available.

item.title: Jagex Clan Cup 2010 Launched!
item.description: It's normally a time of holidays, sunshine and ice cream but not this summer, not with the launch of Jagex Clan Cup 2010! It's been a long wait but it is finally here and improved from last year’s competition.

item.title: International Fight Knights Wallpaper
item.description: Over 7,000 players from 12 international communities took part in this first Fight Knights tournament, with the Polish team triumphing in the end. We’ve created a wallpaper to commemorate their victory.
